description: Information about how a cell is differentiated to a desired cell type or organoid.
title: Differentiation protocol
name: differentiation_protocol

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

provenance.description: Provenance information added or generated at time of ingest.
provenance.title: Provenance
provenance.name: provenance

submission_date.description: When project was first submitted to database.

submitter_id.description: ID of individual who first submitted project.

updater_id.description: ID of individual who last updated project.

document_id.comment: This structure supports the current ingest API. It may change in the future.

accession.description: A unique accession for this entity, provided by the broker.

protocol_core.description: Information about an intended protocol that was followed in the project.
protocol_core.title: Protocol core
protocol_core.name: protocol_core

protocol_id.description: A unique ID for the protocol.
protocol_id.guidelines: Protocol ID should have no spaces.

protocol_name.description: A short name for the protocol.

protocol_description.description: A general description of the protocol.

publication_doi.description: The publication digital object identifier (doi) for the protocol.

protocols_io_doi.description: The protocols.io digital object identifier (doi) for the protocol.

document.description: A filename of a PDF document containing the details of the protocol.

differentiation_method.description: Method applied to cell culture to induce a specific differentiation response.
differentiation_method.comment: Consider making this an ontology in the future.

media.description: Culture media used to induce a specific differentiation response.
media.example: RPMI 1640 + B27; Neurobasal Media; StemPro-34 Serum-Free Medium

small_molecules.description: Small molecules added to stem cell medium to induce a specific differentiation response.
small_molecules.example: Retinoic Acid; CHIR99021 (GSK-inhibitor); Activin A; BMP4

target_cell_yield.description: Percent of target cells obtained after directed differentiation of origin cell.

reagents.description: A list of purchased reagents used in the differentiation protocol.

items.description: Information describing purchased kits or reagents used in a protocol.
items.title: Purchased reagents
items.name: purchased_reagents

retail_name.description: The retail name of the kit/reagent.
retail_name.example: SureCell WTA 3' Library Prep Kit; CytoTune iPS 2.0 Sendai Reprogramming Kit

catalog_number.description: The catalog number of the kit/reagent.

lot_number.description: The batch or lot number of the kit/reagent.

expiry_date.description: The date of expiration for the kit/reagent.
expiry_date.guidelines: Enter the time in date format: yyyy-mm-dd.

kit_titer.description: Appropriate titer and volume recommendations found in kit/reagent Certificate of Analysis.

target_pathway.description: Targeted pathway for specific differentiation response.
target_pathway.comment: Consider making this an ontology in the future.

validation_method.description: Method used to validate origin cell successfully differentiated to target cell.
validation_method.example: Pancreatic Cell DTZ Detection Assay; qPCR; Flow Cytometry; Immunocytochemistry Staining

validation_result.description: Result confirming successful differentiation to target cell type.
validation_result.example: CD103 Positive; Nestin Positive; HCN4 Positive; CD11C Negative
